challengeName: [Bug Fix] Engrafa Workflow Manager UI - Angular version issues
detailedRequirements:
Welcome to the CrowdReason Engrafa Workflow Manager Angular version issues First2Finish challenge. This challenge is part of the Engrafa Service Project.

 

Project Overview

The goal of the Engrafa Project is to help client generate structured data from documents with industry-leading accuracy. Our base application leverages third-party platforms and crowdsourcing to extract useful information from document in an automated fashion. Finally the service helps provide the structured data based on the needs of various clients.

At its core, the Engrafa Service has a Workflow Manager (WM) to automate data extraction and an Integration Manager to handle integrations with 3rd parties. The core Integration Manager(IM) module interfaces with the Workflow Manager to transform the results into formats external systems will recognize. The Integration Manager also notifies clients of newly available data through web hooks and APIs.

 

Challenge Overview

This is a First2Finish challenge. There are some issues with the Workflow Manager UI when we select the latest version of Angularjs. They need to be resolved.

As on overview, selecting the latest Angularjs version seems to not render the page correctly, incorrectly display the url paths.

Challenge Details

Post registration, you will find the details of the issue in the challenge forum.
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
Issue with the Workflow Manager UI. We have provided only the Workflow Manager. Other modules of the application are not required for this challenge.

Submit the changed files in a zip file and provide a README of the changes made.
